successes.title: LUMOback: The Smart Posture Sensor
successes.description: Revolutionary posture sensor and mobile app. Your mom will never nag you again!

Pledges.description: Just want to support the project? Want to vote on the next color for LUMOback? Pledge $5 or more to do both!
EARLY BIRDS Help us get started! One Jet Black LUMOback, original limited-edition. Free shipping to USA. Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.
One Jet Black LUMOback. Free shipping to USA. Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.
One LUMOback in your choice of Jet Black or Mystery Color (you'll get to vote). Free shipping to USA. Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.
RETAIL PRICE. One LUMOback in your choice of Jet Black or Mystery Color (you'll get to vote). Free shipping to USA. Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.
Two LUMObacks in your choice of Jet Black or Mystery Color (you'll get to vote). Free shipping to USA. Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.
FAMILY PACK Four LUMObacks in your choice of Jet Black or Mystery Color (you'll get to vote). Free shipping to USA. Add $20 for shipping to Canada, $30 for international shipping.

BUY IT FOR YOUR OFFICE! Ten LUMObacks in your choice of Jet Black or Mystery Color (you'll get to vote).  Special thank you on our website as an early supporter! Free shipping to USA. Add $40 for shipping to Canada, $60 for international shipping.

DISTRIBUTOR PACK! One-hundred LUMObacks in your choice of Jet Black or Mystery Color (you'll get to vote). Special thank you on our website as an early supporter and meeting with the LUMO team! Free shipping to USA. Add $200 for shipping to Canada, $300 for international shipping.
